_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_CGCATALOG_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# (CATGROUP_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATALOG VARCHAR(256), PRIMARY KEY (CATGROUP_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CGCATALOG_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag#

_config:query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT TOPR.CATGROUP_ID CATGROUP_ID, TOPR.CATALOG_ID CATALOG_ID FROM CATTOGRP TOPR, CATGROUP C WHERE TOPR.CATGROUP_ID = C.CATGROUP_ID AND C.MARKFORDELETE=0 AND CATALOG_ID IN (select catalog_id from storecat where storeent_id in (select storeent_id from storecat where catalog_id=#MASTER_CATALOG_ID#) or storeent_id IN ( select store_id from storerel where relatedstore_id=(select storeent_id from storecat where catalog_id=#MASTER_CATALOG_ID#) and streltyp_id=-4 and state=1)) UNION SELECT DISTINCT R.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD CATGROUP_ID, R.CATALOG_ID CATALOG_ID FROM CATGRPREL R, CATGROUP C WHERE R.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD = C.CATGROUP_ID AND C.MARKFORDELETE=0 AND CATALOG_ID IN (select catalog_id from storecat where storeent_id in (select storeent_id from storecat where catalog_id=#MASTER_CATALOG_ID#) or storeent_id IN ( select store_id from storerel where relatedstore_id=(select storeent_id from storecat where catalog_id=#MASTER_CATALOG_ID#) and streltyp_id=-4 and state=1)) ORDER BY CATGROUP_ID
